content: Joining me on today's call are Jeff Eckel, the company's Chairman and CEO; and Jeff Lipson, CFO and COO; and Marc Pangburn, Executive Vice President and Co-Chief Investment Officer Before turning the call over to Jeff, I'd like to announce that we are hosting an Investor Day on March 21st, during which we will discuss the company in more detail and allow investors and analysts to meet more members of our leadership team. So, to reiterate the non-GAAP accounting for equity method investments is fundamentally the IRR that we expect to achieve and earn over the life of the investments taken on a ratable basis, and we do adjust that accruing IRR level for changes in the projects, as we did in the first quarter of 2022.
